title: Inspector Gadget monster madness
brief_description: Inspector Gadget, Penny and Brain have two more adventures. In the first, the Chief tries to replace Gadget with a computer. In the second, Gadget battles plants gone mad. Episode titles: Replacement; Greenfinger.
